title: Spot instances
shortDescription: Purchase unused compute capacity at significant cost savings, deploying workloads that can handle interruptions and don't need to be completed within a specific period of time.

highlights.content: Ideal for quick proof of concept applications when workload interruption is tolerable.
Scale with a mix of on-demand VMs and interruptible Spot VMs.
Ideal for scalable development, quality assurance, and testing enviroments.
Ideal for risk modeling and advanced data analytics, where a part of your workload will be guaranteed.
